# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Notice ID/Titre du Cahier des Charges** 
`CB-482-41204714 `

**Solicitation Number** W8485-247865/A 
**Closed on Date/Fermé le**  `2023-11-30T14:00:00`
 
**Description**

## Background

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the Department of National Defence is exercising caution in procuring the following equipment:

### Item 1
* **Evacuation Bag/Casualty, Insulated, GSIN 6530, NSN 6530-20-001-1416, Part No.: DSSPM 438-02, NCAGE 35907, Quantity: 100**

## Description of Goods

The Department of National Defence is seeking the submission of priced bid(s) from qualified suppliers for the supply of the Evacuation Bag, casualty, insulated.

Special requirements for bidding:

*   Suppliers proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must provide information on the Brand Name, Model, and/or Part Number, as well as NCAGE Code.

**Tender Documents**

Bidder's package is available in PDF (.PDF) format. Excerpts of the documents mentioned above are available for download. You may:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20713/w8485-247865---amd-001-%28en.pdf.secondary> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20713/w8485-247865---bid-solicitation-%28en-canada-buys_0.pdf.secondary>

### Listing Information

Documents shall be complete,presented/enveloped (package) addressed exclusively the Department of National Defence in one (1) envelope which they stay in good proceed handling care when handling.
